1.0.name: wordpress/passkit-manager
1.0.description:
PassKit Inc proudly releases the "PassKit Manager" WordPress plugin. This free plugin manages PassKit templates & passes for Apple Passbook. Details about the PassKit API are at:

https://code.google.com/p/passkit/

Pre-requisites: 1. A PassKit Account 2. PassKit API key and secret

Get your PassKit Account:

  1. Visit https://create.passkit.com/ ;
  2. Select "Login" in top right corner;
  3. Select "Register now";

This will give you a basic acccount that you can use to create passes for free.

API keys & secret are available to subscribers.

To get your API keys:

  1. Visit https://create.passkit.com/ ;
  2. Select "Login" in the top right corner;
  3. Key in your e-mail address and password, and select login;
